bot.prefix: the prefix of this server is `{{{ prefix }}}`

errors.answer: {{ error }} | Please enter an answer to this command!
errors.exists: {{ error }} | The command {{{ name }}} already exists!
errors.name: {{ error }} | Please enter a name and an answer to the command!

self.description: Add a custom command to the server!

addcommand.success: {{ success }} | The command {{{ cmd }}} has been added to the server!

errors.full: {{ error }} | The URL to the image is invalid or you have no more space on your Discord!
errors.name: {{ error }} | Please indicate the name of the emoji!
errors.url: {{ error }} | Please indicate the url of the emoji!

self.description: Add an emoji to the server!

addemote.success: {{ success }} | Emoji {{{ emoteName }}} added to the server! String: `{{{ emoteString }}}`

afk.deleted: {{ e.warn }} | Your AFK has just been deleted!
afk.member: {{ warn}} | **{{{ member }}}** is currently AFK for:\n ```{{{ reason }}}```

automod.warn: {{{ author }}} | Your message contained a Discord invitation, so it has been deleted. If it was unintentional, you can edit your message again, it was sent to you as a private message!

errors.botPerms: {{ error }} | I need the following permissions to perform this command: `{{{ perms }}}`
errors.channel: {{ error }} | Commands aren't allowed in {{{ channel }}}!
errors.disabled: {{ error }} | This command is currently disabled!
errors.everyone: {{ error }} | You are not allowed to mention everyone or here in the commands.
errors.guild_only: {{ error }} | This command is only available on a server!
errors.memberPerms: {{ error }} | You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this command (`{{{ perm }}}`)
errors.nsfw: {{ error }} | You must run this command in a channel that allows NSFW content!
errors.owner: {{ error }} | Only {{{ owner }}} can run this command!
errors.ratelimit: {{ error }} | You must wait **{{{ seconds }}}** second(s) to be able to run this command again!
errors.unknown: {{ error }} | An error has occurred, please try again in a few minutes.

slowmode.wait: {{ error }} | The channel {{{ channel }}} is in slowmode! Please wait {{{ delay }}} to be able to post a new message!

utils.guildOnly: {{ error }} | This command is only available on a server!
